description:
Learn Search engine optimization (SEO) in under an hour! SEO is the process of optimising your website or a web page to achieve higher search placements in a search engine's "natural" or un-paid ("organic") search results.

In under an hour you will learn to fundamentals of Search Engine Optimisation with direct actionable items. SEO does not have to be difficult and this course will show you why.

We will cover the elements you need to undertake for Web page optimisation, how to leverage tools such as Google Places and Webmaster tools and how to report and monitor performance of your SEO Progress.

The SEO techniques discussed are proven and will help you grow your online footprint within organic search results for Google, Bing , Yahoo and many other search engines.
title: Search Engine Optimisation Fundementals in under 1 hour
